participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and resilient, she has a nurturing side stemming from her experiences.
participant_1.background: my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and caring, he is excited about his growing family and new home.
participant_2.background: i am expecting triplets in three months. i just moved into my first home. i work at a school. a already have a step children.

content.text: hi, i work as a school teacher, and you?
